DOC.brief_summary: The purpose non interventional retrospective study continue collect data patient follow completion Protocol CLS 1003-201 : `` Safety Efficacy Suprachoroidal CLS-TA Intravitreal Aflibercept Subjects Macular Edema Following Retinal Vein Occlusion '' ( ie , parent study ) .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study Safety Efficacy Patients With RVO Subjects Who Completed Parent Study CLS1003-201
DOC.detailed_description: This non-interventional , retrospective study 6 month subject complete parent study CLS1003-201 . This study design collect data patient follow parent study exit visit , either time next treatment RVO least 6 month follow parent study exit visit , whichever occur first . During non-interventional retrospective study , follow data collect online questionnaire ( require , paper ) provide Clearside : - Next RVO therapy administer ( applicable ) , include reason treatment - Continued documentation current change medical ocular condition follow parent study - Concomitant drug therapy change - Visual acuity , include detail method use assessment - Central retinal thickness , include detail equipment use determination - Intraocular pressure , include detail equipment use determination Subjects select base parent study primary investigator 's access medical record access , follow exit CLS1003-201 . Data also collect total number patient include non interventional study well reason patient exclude . Data summarize randomization treatment assignment parent study .
DOC.criteria: Completed enrollment receive additional aflibercept therapy Parent study , CLS1003201
